benchmark_details.name: RealBench
benchmark_details.overview: RealBench is the first Chinese multimodal multi-image dataset designed to evaluate multi-image understanding capabilities in real-world Chinese scenarios, containing 9393 samples and 69910 images.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation framework for multimodal understanding of Chinese multi-image scenarios using real user-generated content.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset is still not exhaustive and can be further expanded to meet the growing data demands of large-scale pretraining models.

data.source: Data is sourced from real user inputs on the Chinese social media platform Xiaohongshu.
data.annotation: Data was collected based on strict filtering criteria ensuring high relevance between images and text.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on model outputs compared to ground truth answers.
methodology.interpretation: High ROUGE-L scores indicate better multi-image reasoning capabilities.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-4o and Claude-3.5-Sonnet performed at about 28.55% and 39.32% accuracy on complex tasks.
methodology.validation: Quality control through reviews by multiple annotators and expert evaluations.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: The dataset includes diverse scenarios from everyday life.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Comprehensive anonymization techniques are implemented to protect user privacy.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Explicit consent obtained from data providers for any data collected.
